# Spielwiese

```{r, fig.height=18, message=F, warning=F, chunky-chunk, echo=F}
games <- liga %>% 
  filter(Saison == 2, Runde == 1) %>% 
  select(Spiel, Spieler)

tbl <- table(games$Spiel, games$Spieler)

games <- as.data.frame.matrix(!!crossprod(tbl))

# games <- games %>% mutate(vs = rownames(.))

yesno <- formatter("span", style = x ~ style(color = ifelse(x, "green", "red")),
                                   x ~ icontext(ifelse(x, "ok", "remove")))

    format_table(games, 
      list(Bjarne = yesno,
           Bodo = yesno,
           Falk = yesno,
           Jan = yesno,
           Johannes = yesno,
           Josh = yesno,
           Kai = yesno,
           Paul = yesno,
           Tobias = yesno
           ), check.rows = T, align = "c", format = "markdown")
```
